intents.name: Plan Shipment
intents.description: Assists in planning the logistics of a shipment, including selecting carriers and scheduling deliveries.
examples: Can you help me plan my shipment to Europe?
What are the best carriers for shipping electronics?
How do I schedule a delivery for my goods?

intents.name: Track Shipment
intents.description: Provides real-time tracking information for shipments and updates on delivery status.
examples: Where is my shipment currently located?
Can you track my package to the US?
What is the expected delivery date for my goods?

name: Logistic and Shipment Tracking
scope: Manages logistics planning and tracks shipments to ensure timely delivery and resolve any issues.
